title: Playing with ubuntu 18.04
desc: Each post automatically takes the first block of text, from the beginning of the content to the first occurrence of excerpt_separator, and sets it in the post’s data hash. Take the above example of an index of posts. Perhaps you want to include a little hint about the post’s content by adding the first paragraph of each of your posts:
